channel.title: 669/704 how to make "item" command for mods/admins only?
channel.description: How do I make so that only modsadmins/owners can spawn with ::item command?

item.title: 669/704 how to make "item" command for mods/admins only?
item.dc:creator: @TehBawz TehBawz
item.description:
@TehBawz wrote:

[quote=“angelofdeath396, post:1, topic:437182”]How do I make so that only modsadmins/owners can spawn with ::item command?[/quote]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“item”)) {
if (cmd.length < 2){
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“Use: ::item id (optional:amount)”);
return true;
}

Replace your original one with this ^. Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: 669/704 how to make "item" command for mods/admins only?
